TTKILL.original: ~s~Stop the car.
~s~Call Brucie.
You can use the police computer to search the police database or view any active reported crimes in the area.
TTKILL.translated: 你可以使用警用电脑搜索警方数据库，或查看本区内任何已报告的且正在活动的犯罪。

TTKILL.original: ~s~Mark Rivas's house on your radar.
~s~Chase down and get rid of ~r~Rivas.
When stopped in a cop car you can access its computer.
TTKILL.translated: 你可以在静止的警车内使用车载电脑。

TTKILL.original: ~s~Lose your wanted level.
~r~Rivas~s~ is escaping on foot. Get him.
To search the database, select "Search Police Records"
TTKILL.translated: 要搜索数据库，选择「搜索警方记录」

TTKILL.original: ~s~Search the police database to find out where LYLE RIVAS lives.
TTKILL.translated: ~s~搜索警方数据库，找到LYLE RIVAS的住处。

TTKILL.original: To enter a name to search for, select "Search by Name"
TTKILL.translated: 要搜索名字，请选择「据姓名搜索」

TTKILL.original: Instructions for using the computer can be found at the bottom of each screen.
TTKILL.translated: 电脑的操作说明会在每个页面的底部出现。

TTKILL.original: ~s~Press ~ACCEPT~ to mark Rivas's house on the radar.
~s~Access the police computer.
Enter search name using the on-screen keyboard, or any attached keyboard device.
TTKILL.translated: 使用屏幕上的键盘或任何已连接的键盘设备来输入要搜索的姓名。

TTKILL.original: ~s~Get a cop car.
~s~Press ~PAD_B~ to leave the police computer.
~s~Press ~INPUT_FRONTEND_PAUSE~ to leave the police computer.
~r~Rivas got away.
~s~The cop car is trashed. Find another.
~s~Press ~INPUT_VEH_HORN~ to switch the siren on and off.
~s~Go to Rivas's ~y~house.
